alembic_workshop_catalyst_bench.effect: Chance the catalyst for a transmutation is not consumed.

alembic_workshop_crystal_array.effect: Increased Transmutation XP at this workshop.

alembic_workshop_essence_condenser.effect: Slightly improved input→output ratios (more essence/resource per action).

alembic_workshop_flux_coils.effect: Reduced Transmutation action time on this tile.

alembic_workshop_scrap_reel.effect: Occasionally converts junk/slag into a small amount of usable material.

arcanist_s_tower_channeling_circle.effect: −cast / tick time for Magic training loops on this tile (clamp-aware).

arcanist_s_tower_familiar_niche.effect: Familiars linked to this tile gain a small stat buff; Magic and Summoning XP from joint use here get a tiny bonus.

arcanist_s_tower_rune_focus.effect: Small chance for Magic training actions to refund or generate extra runes.

arcanist_s_tower_spell_laboratory.effect: +Magic XP on this fragment for spell-drill / training actions.

arcanist_s_tower_target_wards.effect: Slightly reduced incoming damage for villagers performing Magic training here.

archery_range_butts_row.effect: Increased basic Ranged XP from target practice.

archery_range_fletcher_s_bench.effect: Chance to generate extra arrows/bolts from drills.

archery_range_high_stand.effect: Slightly faster drills and a small Defence XP trickle (cover training).

archery_range_moving_target_rig.effect: Advanced drills grant extra XP and a small persistent accuracy bonus.

archery_range_wind_flags.effect: Extra XP on long-range drills, representing wind-reading practice.

barracks_armour_stand.effect: Chance to produce scrap armour/tooling that can be recycled via Smithing.

barracks_guard_beds.effect: Small XP bonus for all combat skills trained on this tile (rested training).

barracks_kit_lockers.effect: Reduced gear/armour degradation from Defence drills.

barracks_shield_rack.effect: Increased Defence XP; Attack drills here gain a small extra Defence XP.

carpentry_hall_blueprint_desk.effect: Extra Carpentry XP; unlocks better BOM/preview UI for constructions attached to this tile.

carpentry_hall_clamp_wall.effect: Chance to duplicate Frames/Panels crafted here.

carpentry_hall_hoist_rail.effect: Faster large (3–6 plank) crafts; those modules count as 1 tier lighter for level checks.

carpentry_hall_pattern_archive.effect: Rare chance to reduce plank cost by 1 on big structural modules.

carpentry_hall_planer_bench.effect: Reduced action time on small (1–2 plank) carpentry crafts on this tile.

farmstead_beehives.effect: Adds a small GP aura to nearby plots and unlocks honey/bee-product hooks for Farming outputs.

farmstead_compost_bin.effect: Enables higher-grade fertilisers and improves seed-refund chance from harvests on this tile.

farmstead_irrigation_channel.effect: Extends Wet duration and gives a small GP bonus while plots here are Wet.

farmstead_orchard_bench.effect: Unlocks vine/tree-type plots on this fragment and gives a tiny Farming XP bonus on those actions.

farmstead_scarecrow.effect: Reduces disease/pest chance on crop plots attached to this fragment.

forager_s_hut_drying_rack.effect: Small chance harvested herbs on this tile upgrade to a higher-quality output or grant +1 extra herb on success.

forager_s_hut_field_cart.effect: Herbs harvested on this fragment auto-deposit into storage up to +1 extra stack and have a tiny chance to refund the consumed node charge.

forager_s_hut_herbarium.effect: Increased chance for +1 duplicate on T6+ herb patches harvested on this tile.

forager_s_hut_pollen_net.effect: Slightly increased chance to roll Herbalism special drops (pouches/spores/etc.) when harvesting on this fragment.

forager_s_hut_stillroom_bench.effect: −small% Herbalism action time and +small% Herbalism XP on this tile (within global clamp).

gemcutter_s_studio_calibration_loupe.effect: Slightly higher chance to produce “perfect” +quality gems used for high-end enchants.

gemcutter_s_studio_dust_separator.effect: Extra gem dust/shard outputs when cutting gems on this fragment.

gemcutter_s_studio_faceting_table.effect: Small chance to gain +1 extra cut gem on success.

gemcutter_s_studio_secure_vault.effect: Small extra XP on high-tier crafts and tiny chance to prevent material loss on failed attempts.

grand_smithy_double_forge_hearth.effect: Reduced Smithing action time on this tile.

grand_smithy_hardware_bench.effect: Construction hardware crafted here has a chance to produce an extra output stack.

grand_smithy_precision_anvil.effect: Small chance to save 1 bar on multi-bar recipes.

grand_smithy_quenching_trough.effect: Gear finished here grants extra Smithing XP and small chance at better quality.

grand_smithy_tool_rack.effect: Increased Smithing XP for all crafts done here.

hearth_kitchen_cold_pantry.effect: Feasts and preserved foods prepared here have extended duration / extra uses before depletion.

hearth_kitchen_oven.effect: −action time and −burn chance for Cooking actions on this tile.

hearth_kitchen_prep_bench.effect: +Cooking XP and small chance to save 1 secondary ingredient on success.

hearth_kitchen_smokehouse.effect: Fish/meat cooked here have a chance to produce smoked/preserved variants with bonus XP.

hearth_kitchen_spice_shelf.effect: Dishes cooked here that grant buffs get slightly stronger buff values (within clamp).

logging_yard_log_rack.effect: Increased logs per successful chop (less waste).

logging_yard_resin_still.effect: Chance for chops here to generate extra resin/amber-like by-products.

logging_yard_rookery.effect: Increased nest drop rate and a small Woodcutting XP bonus.

logging_yard_sawhorse.effect: Reduced Woodcutting action time for nodes tied to this tile.

logging_yard_timber_crane.effect: Extra time reduction when chopping top-tier trees (Yew/Elder) on this tile.

loom_house_cutting_table.effect: Small chance to produce extra cloth pieces from raw fabric.

loom_house_dye_vat.effect: Chance for cloth produced here to become dyed or high-quality variants.

loom_house_pattern_shelf.effect: Chance to save 1 cloth/leather on high-tier Tailoring recipes.

loom_house_pressing_table.effect: Increased Tailoring XP when finishing garments and bolts.

loom_house_spindle_rack.effect: Reduced Tailoring action time on this tile.

net_wharf_crane_boom.effect: Reduced action time for Net & Harpoon nodes; supports heavy hauls on this tile.

net_wharf_net_loft.effect: Increased catch amount/rolls for Net nodes linked to this tile.

net_wharf_smoke_shed.effect: Chance for fish caught here to be auto-converted into preserved/smoked variants.

net_wharf_sorting_table.effect: Small chance to turn “junk” Fishing results into basic useful materials (bones, scrap).

net_wharf_tackle_bench.effect: Increased Fishing XP on this tile.

prospector_s_shaft_core_brace.effect: Slightly higher chance that ore nodes respawn as higher-tier variants on this tile.

prospector_s_shaft_extra_shaft_supports.effect: Reduced Mining action time on this tile.

prospector_s_shaft_gem_sieve.effect: Small chance for ore actions to also produce a low-tier gem or gem dust.

prospector_s_shaft_ore_chute.effect: Small chance to gain +1 extra ore/stone per successful Mining action on this tile.

prospector_s_shaft_surveyor_s_tent.effect: Increased Mining XP from all nodes on this fragment.

runeforge_catalytic_array.effect: Every N catalytic crafts refunds one catalyst.

runeforge_focus_pedestal.effect: Reduced Runecrafting action time here, especially for advanced runes.

runeforge_rune_kiln.effect: Chance for advanced crafts to produce higher-tier or “charged” runes.

runeforge_runic_archive.effect: Increased Runecrafting XP on this tile.

runeforge_stone_hoppers.effect: Slightly increased rune output per essence/stone craft.

scrying_chamber_anchor_sigil.effect: Small discount on Fragment anchoring cost for fragments summoned from this tile.

scrying_chamber_channel_stones.effect: Slightly increased chance that fragments summoned via this tile roll extra modifiers or higher-grade nodes.

scrying_chamber_focus_pool.effect: +Scrying XP for Observe/Calibrate-style actions originating from this tile.

scrying_chamber_omen_ledger.effect: Small chance each Scrying action here grants a free bonus “peek” / extra progress tick and a bit of extra XP.

spirit_lodge_binding_circle.effect: +Spiritbinding XP for rituals performed on this tile.

spirit_lodge_spirit_kennels.effect: Grants each worker on this tile a tiny extra capacity / effectiveness when handling bound spirits/familiars.

spirit_lodge_totem_posts.effect: Bound spirits linked via this tile gain a small HP/defence bonus.

spirit_lodge_veil_curtains.effect: Reduces mishap chance on risky Spiritbinding actions here.

star_observatory_archive_shelves.effect: Completing a Chart here grants a small extra XP bonus and a tiny chance of bonus Stardust.

star_observatory_focus_lens.effect: Slightly higher chance for Fortune Nodes on Charts linked to this fragment to roll higher outcomes.

star_observatory_horizon_balcony.effect: Divination actions here have a small chance to also grant a permanent micro-buff to a random skill associated with this tile (within clamp).

star_observatory_orrery_engine.effect: −Observe/Calibrate action time on this tile (respects global Tempo clamp).

star_observatory_star_chart_desk.effect: +Divination XP for Observe/Calibrate/Refine actions performed on Charts anchored to this tile.

starforge_anchor_vault.effect: Reduced chance to lose shards/fragments on risky Astromancy operations here and a tiny cost discount on top-tier infusions.

starforge_celestial_archive.effect: Extra Astromancy XP on this fragment, especially for high-tier Shard recipes.

starforge_resonance_lattice.effect: Slightly higher chance to create potent/dual-infused shards from crafts on this tile.

starforge_shard_loom.effect: Slightly increased shard output / success on Astromancy crafts on this tile.

summoner_s_circle_containment_sigils.effect: Reduced mishap / backlash chance for high-tier Summoning attempts here.

summoner_s_circle_familiar_pens.effect: Familiars anchored to this tile gain a small HP/damage bonus.

summoner_s_circle_focus_obelisk.effect: −Summoning ritual time on this fragment (within clamp).

summoner_s_circle_offering_altar.effect: Tiny chance to refund a Summoning reagent or generate an extra by-product on success.

summoner_s_circle_ritual_glyphs.effect: +Summoning XP for rituals performed at this circle.

thaumic_crucible_containment_ring.effect: Reduced chance of catastrophic failure / backlash on high-tier thaumaturgy actions.

thaumic_crucible_focus_coils.effect: Slightly higher chance to produce “potent” high-tier thaumic outputs.

thaumic_crucible_glass_retort_bank.effect: Small chance that one input reagent is not consumed.

thaumic_crucible_glyph_ledger.effect: Increased Thaumaturgy XP for all actions here.

thaumic_crucible_vent_array.effect: Reduced Thaumaturgy action time on this tile.

training_arena_footwork_rails.effect: Reduced Attack drill action time on this tile.

training_arena_sparring_circle.effect: When multiple villagers drill here, they gain extra Attack + Defence XP.

training_arena_striking_dummies.effect: Increased Attack XP from drills on this tile.

training_arena_weapon_rack.effect: Small chance to gain metal/wood scrap that can be smelted or reused.

training_arena_weighted_targets.effect: Chance to gain “Technique Insight” consumables from drills.

village_inn_counter.effect: +stackable lot size for Merchant mode sells performed at this tile.

village_inn_guest_rooms.effect: Global Morale decays slightly slower while at least one worker is actively Hosting on this tile.

village_inn_ledger_desk.effect: Merchant mode sells from this tile grant +% coins and a tiny Entertaining XP bonus.

village_inn_stage.effect: Host actions on this fragment gain slightly more Morale and XP (festival-vibes tile).

village_inn_warm_hearth.effect: Host actions here grant extra Morale after calculation.

wayshrine_bell_tower.effect: When ≥2 villagers are training combat skills on this tile, everyone gains a trickle of Prayer XP.

wayshrine_central_altar.effect: +Prayer XP gain for any Prayer actions performed on this tile.

wayshrine_offering_brazier.effect: Modestly reduces Prayer drain rate / extends Prayer buff duration while a worker is on this tile.

wayshrine_pilgrim_benches.effect: Slightly faster Prayer ticks / training loops here and a tiny Prayer XP bonus (clamp-aware).

wayshrine_reliquary_niche.effect: Small chance for combat on this fragment to reroll low-value loot into devotional/Prayer-tagged drops.
